txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.

Wanted: Light carapaces from insects and spiders infesting the Shire. Bounders are looking for proof of those who are assisting them in keeping the Shire safe. Deliver the items to Hal Hornblower at Hobbiton centre.
'These look like they came from some nasty creatures. Looks like you are really helping out.\n\n'Thank you, kindly.'
'If you are willing to help then I think the Bounders would be grateful.'
Hal Hornblower wants light carapaces. Hal can be found near the stable in the centre of Hobbiton.
Deliver the light carapaces to Hal Hornblower in Hobbiton
You have accepted a task to acquire light carapaces for the bounders of the Shire. They have deputized Hal Hornblower to collect the items near the stables in Hobbiton.
Wanted: Light carapaces from insects and spiders infesting the Shire.
